resources.string: Your pdf file saved in SD card/My Resume/resumes
Would you like to share your experience of using Gx Resume
Your research papers details goes here
Your extra curricular activities goes here
Here, input your contact details like address, contact no etc. in the respective fields.

In this form, enter your personal details such as Name, Father Name, Mother name etc. as declared in your Certificates or Documents. If you want to add additional information you can add custom fields value pears.
Upload your image. The image will be placed on the Resume.\nNOTE: Images are not displayed in every template. There are special templates which have a place for image display.
Write your Objective. Objective means what will you do if you get selected.!
Enter the details of your educational qualifications like HSC/SSC/AISCE/Intermedidiate or any Degree/Course
Enter your past working experience details here like where you worked earlier and during which period you were working there etc.\nNOTE: Leave all fields under this category empty if your a Fresher.
Enter the details of your own Research papers here.\nNOTE: Leave all fields under this category empty if you do not have published any Research papers.
Enter the details of the projects you completed during your study or worked on any project privately after completing your studies.
Write the skills you have. Your skills reflect your personality and compatibility.
Mention the activities you are involved in your daily life. These also reflect your personality and compatibility.

Enter the details of the persons who are referring you for a particular job at a particular place.\nNOTE: Leave all fields under this category empty if you are not referred by anyone oor if you are applying on your own.
Tap one declaration among the given declarations or enter custom declaration of your own.
Tap it to go to the next screen. (When it becomes disabled, then there is no other field left empty).
Tap it if you want to go to previous screen.
Tap it if you want to add fields to input additional information (fields for whom are not already there).
Tap it to save the information you enetered.
Tap it to view the list of available templates and select from there, the template in which you want to get pdf copy of your resume.
Tapping on it generates pdf of your resume, and saves it on your device.
This button will be enabled only after pdf is generated (by tapping on Get pdf). Tapping on this option opens the generated pdf copy using the pdf viewing app installed on your device.
Rate this app, share your experience of using this app and give suggestions for improving it (if any). Tapping on this link redirects you to the Playstore.
You can share your pdf copy through mail or any other sharing platforms available on your device. This link will be enabled only after generating the pdf (by tapping on "Get pdf").
You can share your pdf copy through mail or any other sharing platforms available on your device. This link will be enabled only after generating the pdf (by tapping on "Get pdf").
